= Shell Syntax =
	= Quoting =
	Quoting is used to remove the special meaning of certain characters or words to the shell,
	There are three quoting mechanism:
		
		- `\`:: Escape character, it preserves the literal valur of the next character that follows
		- `''`:: Single quotes, it preserves the literal value of each character within the quote
		- `""`:: Double quotes, it preserves the litarel value of each character within the quote
					Except `$`, `''` and `\`
